cf-view training videosÂ¶

A series of videos showing various features of cf-view

  • Introduction - Make map, vertical cross section, vector and line plots

  • Data transform - Dimension collapses such as zonal or time mean, interpolation to another grid

  • View data - View and inspect data as a table of values

  • Properties- View, modify, delete and add properties to data and dimensions

  • Saving data - modify and save data to a netCDF file
